headerDisplay: The **Homebridge TCC** plugin allows you to control your North American Honeywell Total Comformt Connect thermostats from HomeKit.

name.title: Name
name.description: Can be anything you want, this is only used in the homebridge logs and is not the thermostat name.

refresh.title: Refresh Token
refresh.description: Data polling interval in seconds, defaults to 15 minutes.

storage.title: Storage
storage.description: Storage of chart graphing data for history graphing, either fs or googleDrive, defaults to fs.

usePermanentHolds.title: Refresh Token
usePermanentHolds.description: If set to true, temperature changes will be set as permanent holds, rather than temporary holds. This will allow you to use HomeKit automations to completely replace your thermostat's schedule. If set to false, the temperature changes will expire after a certain period of time and resume your normal schedule. By default, this is off.
